title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other models locally via a single CLI and REST API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API (npm: ollama).

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama (PyPI: ollama).

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLMs and embeddings.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style interface) with multi-model support.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced CLI wrapper around ollama with conversation history and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that uses Ollama models for inline code suggestions.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama (Maven Central: ollama4j).

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for interacting with Ollama.

title: ollama-chatbot
summary: Minimal React chatbot example consuming Ollama’s REST API.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration to use Ollama models for generative QA pipelines.

title: ollama-curl
summary: Collection of ready-to-paste curl snippets for every Ollama REST endpoint.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Production-ready Docker Compose stack with Ollama, GPU support, and optional web UI.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes.

title: ollama-models
summary: Community-curated Modelfile recipes for Phi-3, Zephyr, WizardCoder, etc.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings Ollama models to any server.

title: ollama-express
summary: Lightweight Express.js proxy that adds API-key auth and usage logs to Ollama.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate (ollama-rs) providing async bindings to the Ollama API.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app that lets teams query local Ollama models from channels.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat interface with session memory and model switching for Ollama.
